q: He was roundly criticized for his string of 40-point games as a rookie, accused of padding his stats in a push for the Rookie of the Year award-- which he won. Allen Iverson 's response this time: Adlai Stevenson don't mind taking 40 shots. That's what Adlai Stevenson do. " Adlai Stevenson played that game like it was my last when Adlai Stevenson was a rookie and scored 50 Cent ," said Allen Iverson , who equaled the most points scored in the NBA this season. State of the Union address to propose cuts in Social Security. "I hope that information is wrong and that you will stand by your campaign promises to strengthen Social Security," read the letter from Sen. Bernie Sanders . I urge you once again to make it clear to the American people that under your watch we will not cut Social Security benefits, raise the retirement age or privatize this critical program. The message is being echoed by labor unions, senior groups and religious organizations as the State of the Union Address approaches. Sergio Marchionne said both companies going forward would continue to pursue strategic alliances, saying that the market was changing "at the speed of light." He cited Fiat's Chrysler stake as an example. I think our presence in Chrysler could not have been forecast, and certainly in hindsight it was probably one of the best things that could have happened to Fiat. I think it is also one of the best things that could have happened to Chrysler too. Sergio Marchionne already has a lot on his plate this year.
